extension.name: Ninja RSS Syndicator
extension.author: Ninjaforge
extension.description: Use this module to display your feed buttons

field.name: msg
field.label: Message
field.description: Enter the header message for the module here.

field.name: feedid
field.query: SELECT id, feed_name AS title FROM #__ninjarsssyndicator_feeds WHERE published = 1 ORDER BY feed_name
field.label: Feeds
field.description: Select which feeds you would like to show in the module, for all feeds select none.

field.name: link_to_feed_icon
field.label: Link to feed icon?
field.description: Add the RSS feed icon to the header when module published. This will add a feed icon to the URL bar of your browser.

field.name: link_target
field.label: Open feed in new window/tab?
field.description: When the feed link or icon is clicked, would you like it to open in a new window/tab?

field.name: show_feed_name_text
field.label: Show feed name text?
field.description: As well as the feed icon, show the name as text next to the icon.
